package.name: Woo
package.summary: Woomio provides increased exposure for retailers through enabling customers to share their purchases on social media.
package.description:
Woomio enables your customers to share their purchases - your products - on social media, in return of a discrete commission for every purchase generated. This gives your stores and your products an authentic presence on social media, along with valuable insights on your customers' buying behavior.
How does it work?
1) When a purchase is being made in your store, an email is sent to the buyer with information about how to share the purchased item on Woomio
2) When the item has been shared on Woomio, inspired peers of your customer will visit your shop for more details about similar items
3) If a purchase is being made in your store as a result of your customer's post, your customer will be eligible for a 15% commission
Compatibility
Woomio is fully compatible with all Magento versions and modules.
